procurementTechnique.title: Procurement technique
procurementTechnique.description: The details of the procurement technique used in this contracting process (based on EU eForms data model)

maxNumberTenderers.title: Maximum number of tenderers
maxNumberTenderers.description: The maximum number of tenderers that may be awarded a contract in the framework agreement. Set to 0 for an unlimited number of tenderers.

frameworkAgreementCompetition.title: Framework agreement competition
frameworkAgreementCompetition.description: Whether or not the competition is reopened for each subsequent contract of the framework agreement.

frameworkAgreementDurationJustification.title: Framework agreement duration justification
frameworkAgreementDurationJustification.description: The justification for exceptional cases when the duration of framework agreements exceeds the legal limits.

frameworkAgreementBuyerCategories.title: Framework agreement buyer categories
frameworkAgreementBuyerCategories.description: Any additional categories of buyers participating in the framework agreement and not mentioned by name (e.g. 'all hospitals in the Tuscany region').

dynamicPurchasingSystem.title: Dynamic purchasing system
dynamicPurchasingSystem.description: Whether a dynamic purchasing system is involved and, in case of central purchasing bodies, whether it can be used by buyers not listed in this procedure.

electronicAuction.title: Electronic auction
electronicAuction.description: Whether or not an electronic auction is used.

electronicAuctionURL.title: Electronic auction URL
electronicAuctionURL.description: The internet address of the electronic auction.

electronicAuctionDescription.title: Electronic auction description
electronicAuctionDescription.description: Any additional information about the electronic auction.
